org.modelio.api.editor

Interface IMDATextEditor


  • public interface IMDATextEditor
    Interface defining a text editor in Modelio. A text editor is bound to a model element and a file, and must have one of those types:
  • com.modeliosoft.modelio.edition.MDDEditorID
  • com.modeliosoft.modelio.edition.RTEditorID
  • com.modeliosoft.modelio.edition.TXTEditorID

    • Each editor can be set to read-only mode.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ModelElement getElement()
      Get the element corresponding to this editor.
      File getFile()
      Get the file opened in the editor.
      EditorType getType()
      Get the editor's type.
      boolean isDirty()
      Indicates whether of not the editor's content has been modified.
      It matches the presence of the little '*' in the editor's header.
      void reload()
      Reload the content of the editor from the corresponding file.
      void save()
      Save the content of the editor.
      Triggers IMDAEditorListener.documentSaved(IMDATextEditor, ModelElement, File) on the current listener.
      void setListener(IMDAEditorListener listener)
      Set the listener who will be notified when a 'save' or 'close' event occurs.
      void setReadonlyMode(boolean readOnly)
      Change the editor's editon mode.
      A read only editor can't be modified.

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        File getFile()
        Get the file opened in the editor.
        Returns:
        a file.

      • save

        void save()
        Save the content of the editor.
        Triggers IMDAEditorListener.documentSaved(IMDATextEditor, ModelElement, File) on the current listener.

      • reload

        void reload()
        Reload the content of the editor from the corresponding file.

      • isDirty

        boolean isDirty()
        Indicates whether of not the editor's content has been modified.
        It matches the presence of the little '*' in the editor's header.
        Returns:
        true if the content of the editor has been modified.

      • setReadonlyMode

        void setReadonlyMode(boolean readOnly)
        Change the editor's editon mode.
        A read only editor can't be modified.
        Parameters:
        readOnly - true if the editor is read only.

      • setListener

        void setListener(IMDAEditorListener listener)
        Set the listener who will be notified when a 'save' or 'close' event occurs.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to attach to the editor.
        See Also:
        IMDAEditorListener

      • getType

        EditorType getType()
        Get the editor's type.
        Returns:
        the editor's type.

      • getElement

        ModelElement getElement()
        Get the element corresponding to this editor.
        Returns:
        a model element.
